tool.name: SpectraFilterParentPeakMower
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: The size of the m/z window where the peaks are removed, +/- window_size
If the precursor has no charge set, the default charge is assumed
Set to 1 if precursor ions of all possible charge states should be removed
Whether NH3 loss peaks from the precursor should be removed
Whether H2O loss peaks from the precursor should be removed
Reduce the intensities of the precursor and related ions by a given factor (set 'set_to_zero' to 0)
Factor which is used to reduce the intensities if 'reduce_by_factor' is selected
Reduce the intensities of the precursor and related ions to zero
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Applies thresholdfilter to peak spectra.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.8.0/html/TOPP_SpectraFilterParentPeakMower.html
